actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

official_title: To ensure an evidence-based funding approach to study the effects of health profession opportunity grant demonstration projects, and to evaluate the demonstration projects.
short_title: Impacts and Outcomes for Health Career Training Act

summary.text:
Impacts and Outcomes for Health Career Training Act

This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to study the impact of demonstration projects funded by grants for providing low-income individuals with education and training for health care occupations, including the effects of the projects on participants' employment and earnings.

titles.title: Impacts and Outcomes for Health Career Training Act
Impacts and Outcomes for Health Career Training Act
To ensure an evidence-based funding approach to study the effects of health profession opportunity grant demonstration projects, and to evaluate the demonstration projects.
